text: The Liceo Tommaso Gulli is a prestigious high school located in Reggio Calabria, Italy. Founded in 1908 it was initially a women's boarding school preparing female students to become teachers and nurses. It has the title in honor of the military Tommaso Gulli. ==References== Category:1909 establishments in Italy Category:Schools Category:Buildings and structures in Italy Category:Reggio Calabria
title: Liceo Tommaso Gulli
